text: <@U02E3CRMA>: let's test performance of old style blob detection + blob on cat finger output as a combo

Cat filter debug output in cooktop. Note the VAST improvement of fingertip identification in all corners. Bottom right still an issue (maybe we special case the density? Maybe we change the menu target?)

but i will keep this to myself for the moment

gotcha. i figured as much. seems like most of the stuff that was in place to do it before would be largely invalid given the new data
simpler than that: i need to apply the same homography technique Jenny's using for the bounds-check, using the calibration points
